title: nonpareil
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023060611/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Terminology](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023060611/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Terminology) : Nonpareil**

An archaic term referring to a type size approximating six point. From a traditional French adjective meaning matchless or peerless.
author: ben_archer
